DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to demonstrate bioequivalence of a newly developed fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet containing linagliptin and metformin extended release compared to the free combination of linagliptin and metformin extended release, both under fed and fasted conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a FDC Tablet of Linagliptin/Metformin (5mg/1000mg) Extended Release in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male or female subjects Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy condition
